body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to the Plane of Earth or fey type; Benefit: Members of this race gain the following supernatural ability: Once per day, a member of this race can will the earth to rumble and shift, transforming a 10-foot-radius patch of earth, unworked stone, or sand into an area of difficult terrain centered on a square it can touch. This lasts for a number of minutes equal to the user's level, after which the ground returns to normal.
name: Treacherous Earth
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Treacherous Earth
